law.text: Unless otherwise exempted, an appeal to the Circuit Court may be taken as a matter of right from the juvenile session of the District Court from dispositional orders under KRS 610.110. The appeal shall be taken in the manner provided in the Rules of Criminal Procedure, and the Circuit Court shall, in the best interest of the child, hear such cases expeditiously.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 350, sec. 24, effective April 10, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 32, effective July 1, 1987.
